l3m.bdd.outils.xml

Class XMLUtil.DocumentTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • l3m.bdd.outils.xml.XMLUtil.DocumentTransform
  • Enclosing class:
    XMLUtil

    public static class XMLUtil.DocumentTransform
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner class to apply XSL transformations to serialize DOM document into String or files

                            java.lang.String outputFileName)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        write a DOM Document in a XML file
        Parameters:
        doc - the DOM Document to serialize in a file

      • fromTransformation

        public static java.lang.String fromTransformation(javax.xml.transform.Transformer t,
                                                  org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                           throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Cette méthode applique une transformation à un Document DOM et renvoie le document transformé sous la forme d'une chaine de caractères (String).
        Parameters:
        doc - the DOM document to process by XSLT
        t - a transformer to be used to process the Document doc
        Returns:
        a String resulting from the XSL transformation of doc
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • fromDefaultTransformation

        public static java.lang.String fromDefaultTransformation(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                                  throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                                                         javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Cette méthode transforme un document DOM en XML.
        Parameters:
        doc - the DOM document to process by XSLT
        Returns:
        a String resulting from the default transformation of doc, as to say it is serialized into a XML String
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • fromXSLTransformation

        public static java.lang.String fromXSLTransformation(javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource xslStreamSource,
                                                     org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                              throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                                                     javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        Cette méthode transforme un document DOM par l'intermédiaire d'une feuille de transformation xsl dont le flux source (SourceStream) est fourni en paramètre. Elle renvoie le document transformé sous la forme d'une chaine de caractères (String).
        Parameters:
        xslStreamSource - a stream source providing the XSL stylesheet
        doc - the DOM document to process by XSLT
        Returns:
        a String resulting from the XSL transformation of doc as written in the stylesheet provided by the stream source
        Throws:
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

      • fromXSLTransformation

        public static java.lang.String fromXSLTransformation(java.lang.String xslFileName,
                                                     org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        return the String resulting from of an XSL transformation of a source DOM document
        Parameters:
        xslFileName - name of the file containing the XSL stylesheet
        doc - the DOM document to process by XSLT
        Returns:
        a String resulting from the XSL transformation of doc as written in the stylesheet xslFileName
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
